column1: Uchi////This was so hard not to give them a 5 star rating
column2: but when the price goes up
column3: so does my expectations and my critical eye looks to catch anything that isn't 5 star worthy. Don't get me wrong
column4: Uchi is fantastic when it comes to a play on Japanese food
column7: but there are a few things that just didn't settle well with me that made me knock this restaurant down to a 4 star.
